bill.summary: 5/17/2006--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) the needs of children affected by major disasters should be given special consideration in disaster preparedness, response, recovery, and mitigation activities; and (2) the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) should conduct activities to address such needs.
